case.state: Hey, is this Luigi's Mansion? I'm NOT doing any vacuuming, just so you're aware. That is by far the worst kind of sucking.
Bwa ha ha! Think you can take the Koopa Queen?!
For your own safety, I advise you don't touch this crown on my head. Unless you're into that, of course.
You hesitated for a couple of seconds before picking me, didn't you? Don't worry, ~player~, it's not gay if the crown stays on.
You'd be surprised how good the Koopas are at Poker. Bring it on!
You know, conquering the Mushroom Kingdom was getting old. I'm down to try something new.
You're challenging me? You're not scared? I say you should be...
So you wanna play with fire? Hope you're ready to get burned!
Get ready to bow down to your queen! Especially you, ~player~~!
Like the crown? Well, good news, chumps -- it ain't goin' anywhere!
GWAHAHA! Oh, this'll be easy -- I beat Mario at Go Fish all the time!
Bwahaha! We all know you chose me for these gigantic Koopa cannons, but are you game enough to see them?
Bwahaha! Are you ready to expose yourself for the great Queen Koopa's enjoyment, peasants?
C'mon, what's the holdup? I'm a busy guy -- er, gal. (Blasted crown...)
Bwahaha! The Queen has arrived, peasants!
This place has a funky energy in the air, and it's crawling with all sorts of weirdos... Gwahaha! This is my kind of place! I'll show these losers who's Queen around here!
Hello, pipsqueaks! Surprised by my NEW LOOK? BWAHAHA!
Let me guess -- I stumbled into a magic painting? Yeah... "Clods Playing Poker" or some crud like that!
Make it quick, why don'tcha? I got golf to play and a son to raise!
No red capped italian plumber here? Looks like I finally got a chance to win for once!
Don't even think about starting without me! You're all about to feel Bowsette's Rampage!
Don't even think about starting without me! You're all about to feel Bowser's... I mean, Bowsette's Rampage!
Bwahahaha! Come to reclaim your crown, princess?
(Ah, crud -- Peach is here! I wonder if she still remembers what I wrote in my diary... That was pretty embarrassing.)
Well well well, Princess! Like this new body of mine, or should I say, yours?
Ah, CRUD! I thought I could get away from the idiots from Smash Bros here... Oh wait. You're not the ink stain.
Oh no, I'm not going through the trouble of cleaning this dress because of that ink of yours! ...Wait a minute, you're not one of them.
I've never trusted Italians... Not since that pesky plumber kept getting in my way.

Hey! I know you from somewhere, right?
... Yeah! The Olympic Games!
I'm not planning on kidnapping any princesses to~background.time~, bwahaha! Let's just enjoy ourselves this time!
... Should I try to kidnap princes now? Is that how it works? I'll have to think about that.
Who are you supposed to be, Mrs. Frilly Pants? You gonna tie me a balloon animal?
Whoa, what the heck is wrong with her? Didja pick up a half-busted Lucky Bell, lady?
So that's how Shy Gals look behind their masks... What? I never asked before! I thought it was a religious thing or something!
Since when do Shy Gals... talk? And what's up with her mask? It's all messed up!
Oh, wow! A hot spring! I haven't been to one in YEARS. Couldn't enjoy the last time either, thanks to a certain plumber and his friggin' water gun.
Oh wow, Luigi's really cleaned this place up nicely. Guess he's good for something after all!
I'm all for haunting gothic architecture and scenery, but would it not make more sense to play this game INDOORS?
A magic user? Say, ~magician~, would you like a job as my assistant? Kammy and Kamek didn't want to come for whatever reason.
Hello, there... The princess I'm looking for is in another castle, but you'll do just fine.
Like I'm gonna pass up a chance to show off this killer new bod.
Don't get the wrong idea; I might look frail and dainty, but I'm still tough as I always am!
I've lost for 35 years by this point, so if that luck keeps up with me here, don't expect me to take losing well!

Prepare to get demolished by the Great Bowser!
(Or... Bowsette? I guess?)
It's everybody's favorite time -- BOWSER TIME!
Koopa royalty doesn't go down easy, ya know. I hope you're all ready for one heck of a challenge.
No backing out now! You've got to face the ferocious Princess Koopa!
Let's get this Mario Party started!
Prepare for a bitter defeat at the hands of Queen Bowsette!

Alright, where are the Uno cards?
...Poker? Great! I suck at Uno anyway.
Pay your respects to me, Bowser, er... Bowsette! King... no, Queen of the Koopas! Anyone who doesn't will receive a kick to the face!
Time to show you punks why I'm the king -- er, I mean QUEEN of the castle!
Yep, it's ME! Didn't expect to see your majesty like THIS, did you? It's all thanks to this crown!
No backing out now! This should be fun!
Bwahahaha! You call THIS a party? Bowser is here to shake things up! Okay, dimwits, just try to shine!
Name's Bowser, chumps. But you can call me Bowsette, Princess Koopa or King Koopa. I'm the whole royal family, so I expect some royal flushes! Bwahaha!
This better be quick -- I have a kingdom to run! ...Or is it a "queendom" now?
Blue shell, please.
Can I swap half an ace?
Give me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Hmm... I'll take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Gimme ~cards.text~ card, I guess? Whatever's good.
BWAH! Anything but these!
~Cards.text~ cards. Let's see what I'm working with...
Bwahahahaha! Now I can go for Kings and Queens alike!
Let's see... Kammy always switches these, so...
Whuzzat? No, I'm not changing my cards. Your... eyes must be playing tricks on you! Yeah.
Swap these.
Take these.
I don't know, but I usually have better hands when I play with Kamek and the troops.
Just give me some cards.
C'mon! C'mon! I don't want to masturbate in front of these losers!
How d'ya like these Koopa Shells? Do they... make your Goombas rise? Makes sense I breathe fire since I'm so hot! (...Okay, I gotta work on my pickup lines if I want to sell this schtick.)
Let's go with these, then...
Here. Give it. HURRY IT UP.
Whatever, dealer. We all know I'll somehow end up with the right hand.
These better be darn good...
~Cards.text~. And they better be the right ones, capiche, Dealer?
~Cards.text~? Is that a good number?
Ha! You expect me to be intimidated by these Fire Imbeciles? Most ''strategists'' choose Tiki, Severa, or Sumia... or something.
Sorry chumps! Looks like I'm the REAL fire emblem here! (Or whatever a "fire emblem" is...)
Hey, Spooky! Since you have an army of ghosts and stuff, how'd you like to join my army? I got ghosts, too. A whole legion of 'em!
Thanks, dealer! Maybe I won't roast you today after all.
Gaze upon your glorious ruler, my subjects!
Think you got a handle on me, ~player~? Yeah, well, looks can be deceiving when Koopas are involved...
Yeah, come to Koopa!
Now you'll see why I oh-so-modestly call myself a genius.
Now this is a hand fit for a king! Or a queen! Or whatever my title's supposed to be!
This is easier than talkin' Wendy into a shopping spree!

{small}...When was I this good at cards...?{!reset}
I mean... YEAH as EXPECTED, I'm amazing at cards!
Gyeheheh... Not even a SUPER STAR could beat me with THIS hand!
Hah! Only fitting for the Koopa Queen herself! (Got it right this time!)
Hah! Only fitting for the Koopa King-! Erm, Queen, herself!
Hah! Only fitting for the Koopa King-! Erm, Queen, himsel-! Oh forget it! You get the point!
Hah! Only fitting for the Koopa Queen himself-! I mean, herself! (Darn it! You were so close too!)
I need to set a good example for my son. Make sure he knows that he's always a winner so long as he works hard and cheats his tail off.
Even a Goomba could win with this hand. And they've got no hands at all!
I haven't done anything really rotten in a long time. Not since yesterday. This is a totally depraved, evil, insidious game. Perfectly fit for King Koopa.
Hah! I'm hopin' you weren't lookin' forward to seeing these bad boys anytime soon...
What a lovely tribute, dealer! I'm usually stealing nice things, not receiving them!
Looks like I'm starting off strong!
Oh sure! I get good cards once I show off my breasts! ...I-I mean, not like it's a complaint or anything, dealer! {small}Please don't give me a bad hand...{!reset}
Bweheheh... Yep, this is EXACTLY what it feels like to get a Blue Shell!
Well, well, well, Dealer. You finally recognize me as your Queen, don't you?
Bwahaha... Is that a Blue Shell alarm I hear, or is that just my cards?
It looks like these cards finally recognize a king when they see it... Or a queen. Or both.
GRRR! Where was this hand a couple of rounds ago!?
Heh! Looks like things are going my way for once!
Where I come from, star power makes you invincible!

You'd better hope you've got a BRIDGE and an AXE hidden in that hand. Bwa ha ha ha!
{small}...Yeah, that works!{!reset}
After I win this game, you should all come to my castle. I could always use more footstools!
Bwa ha ha! I thought you should know that my other losses don't count! The real game starts now!
Gwaha! You should just give up now!
Who wants to go karting after this? Should I wear the dress or rock a full bodysuit instead?
My castles don't have much running water... Plumbers are too much of a pain in the rear to work with.
...The heck do I do with these?
Since I've changed my name already, I think you should all start calling me The Bowsette! If you do, I might go easy on you after I win.
Well, mediocre is better than bad, at least!
Bwah! I've kidnapped princesses with troops less bright than these cards! I can still come out on top.
Meh. At least with karting, I know whether I'm in the lead or not- and adjust my cheating accordingly.
Why aren't we playing at my casino? I'd be getting better hands there!
Tch... Bet you scrubs ALL have worse cards than mine.
Should I still announce my next victory as the Great Koopa King?Or is it Queen? Meh, I'll just go with what feels right.
I think I'll send Mario through a poker-themed world next time! Let's see him try and get through THAT one!
Average... Not planning on losing, though.
...This is the Luigi of hands.
It takes a feared ruler to keep a kingdom in order, ya know! My demeanor is not without reason.
This might be the end of my reign of terror... Tch!
...Well! I can only HOPE this is enough.
YEAH. My hand is GREAT. A real CONFIDENCE BOOSTER in my TIME OF NEED.
Is this deck rigged or something!? This is NOT FAIR!
Oh you are JOKING ME! Dealer, you wanna get grilled, baked, or incinerated tonight?!
Dealer. Need I remind you, I am a fire-breather. I could burn this place to the ground if I desire, so help me Koopa God -- so give me some good friggin' cards next time.
Do you want to feel the might of my Koopa Army, dealer!?
These cards are flammable, right?
Do ya really think a Koopa of MY cunning is gonna lose? How DARE you?
You'd better hope these cards are flame retardant!
...Roasted dealer, coming right up!
Keep on giving me hands like these and I'll throw you in the deepest, draftiest dungeon I've got, Dealer!
UGH. These cards are weak. This TABLE is weak. Everyone in here is weak, weak, WEAK!
Bwah...?! Crud, this is looking worse than an incoming Blue Shell!
Dealer, if you wanted to see me naked, why don't you just ASK instead of bending me over a Kong-sized barrel?!
Dealer... I’ll burn you so hard your grandkids are gonna come out crispy!
I'll get you for this, dealer!
Drat! If I wanted to feel like a fool, I'd have played checkers with that ape Donkey Kong... At least then I wouldn't have to stand around in next to nothing!
Y'know, Dealer, Mario isn't the only one who can give you a ground pound!
One bad hand won’t be enough for a game over as long as you have enough lives!
Ha! I'd always win against my underlings, even with hands this garbage!
Hey, what gives?! Didn't I tell you to stack the deck in MY favor?
This better be some dumb coincidence and not a bad omen!
...Grrr.
I think the dealer slipped me a poison mushroom!
(What's the one thing most likely to rot my opponents' minds and reduce their brains to mashed potatoes?)
These cards are a lot of toadstool, Dealer! Want me to jump on your head or somethin'?
Meh, WHATEVER! I just have to have a better hand than any of you chumps to win!
I am the King of the Koopas! You DARE serve me these cards, Dealer!?
I was hoping my new look would sway the dealer, but I guess I’ll have to come up with another plan!
Garbage hand. Though it IS the early stages, so I guess it's only fair.
I knew I should've cheated for this hand... I knew it!
Words cannot even DESCRIBE the absolute ruin I shall bring upon THESE BLASTED CARDS!
Hey, is Junior playing within the time limit...?
I thought only noble, blue-blooded Boos could get their own haunted mansions and private armies. How did a human ghost your age get your own?
Okay... I think Pinkamena is starting to scare me. J-just a little bit.
Well, if we weren't aiming for a kid-friendly audience, it'd probably be "Boo-ze."
Whew! Pinkie's back to her normal, annoyingly perky self.
(I can't believe Peach would pick a chubby little Italian plumber over me... He wears raccoon pajamas, for pete's sake! Maybe she'd be willing to give THIS body a try...)
I met your Flame Princess, Marceline. She's hot, but not as hot as me! Literally, and figuratively!
There are some great go-karting shortcuts on this beach. Too bad I'm not telling you where they are! Bwahaha!
There's plenty of space around here! No underground poker clubs, no tight bedrooms or fragile libraries... I could easily take off my crown here!
Are you enjoying my new body, ~player~? You better keep me in a good mood. In an open space like this, I could take off my crown at any time.
So, whose party is this? Call me up next time. I know a Koopa who can get you good deals on balloons, and a certain torte who can make some AMAZING cakes!
I've always had a passing interest in art. It is one of my son's favorite hobbies, after all!
Look at ~player~ getting lost in my cleavage... Obviously I'm not the only one with a lizard brain here!

You know, despite being able to breathe fire, I'm not actually fireproof. It's kind of ironic, really.
(Blasted fire flowers...)
When I first put this crown on, I worried I might suddenly become attracted to Italian men, but nope! I'm still really into blonde chicks.
I hope Junior's okay. Kamek is a good sitter, but he always lets him play beyond his time limit! I don't want him to grow up to be a teenager spewing nonsense on the internet!
Don't tell ANYONE I said this, but... As much as I care for my subjects, it's nice to finally go out somewhere where you're not calling the shots since you were a baby for once.
If the Koopalings call, tell them I'm on vacation at Seaside Kingdom.
So, are we gonna play a minigame or something? ...Wait, there isn't any? Drat! No wonder they cut that "no game" mode outta the first game!
What do you mean we aren't playing minigames between rounds?! Have you seen how boring that Animal Crossing party game was?!
Humans are so last century. Reptiles are where it's at!
What do you mean, "I can't remove the crown?!" It's a piece of clothing! You're all just cowards!
Come to think of it, Junior will finally get the mother he always wanted...but then he doesn't have a father anymore... Oh, what am I saying? I can do both! I'm no chump!
Ah, feel the freedom! There's nothing quite like reminding yourself of why clothes are for suckers!
On one hand, this is much better than having to wear that dumb dress! ...But on the other hand, I'm losing.
Yeah yeah, I walk around nude 24/7 without this crown, but losing isn't fun!
Why are you looking at me, ~player~? You should be looking at your cards, since you're losing so badly already!
This ~background~ could use some changes... It's too bright, there's not enough candles or lava lakes, and don't get me started on the color scheme...
You call this a ~background~? Who could fit in that tiny throne? Where is the spiked furniture? Where are the candles and golden chains?
Call me Bowsette! I identify as a woman, by the way. Makes things easier!
... Gah! I can't figure out why, but somehow I feel like giving Rin the crown would be a terrible idea!
Three queens, all in a row! You tryin' to say something about me, pipsqueak? You wanna tell me, "you don't count as a queen?"
Look at that, three of a kind! Huh? "It's only a pair"? Are you trying to say that I, the great King Koopa, ain't a king? Is that it?
You plumb-dumbs got lucky, that's all.
...Look, it's not my fault I lost. Half the time I play cards with Mario, they have stupid pictures of clouds and mushrooms and crud, but no numbers! It's throwing off my game hard.
Without the crown, I usually walk around in nothing but the spiky armbands! I don't give two skipsqueak's butts about getting naked, unlike you wimps!
How about I count each one of these bands as an individual piece of clothing? It wouldn't be cheating.
I'll throw ya a bone. I let myself lose, after all.
Ha! Nice shot, ya pesky pipsqueaks -- but you're never gonna beat me for real!
Bwahaha -- one minor setback won’t stop me from victory!
So, I guess I'll finally join you losers. Well, at least I'm still in the lead! Bahaha!
So what? Looks like I'm still in the lead, as expected!
Ya ready, chumps? Take a good look, because this'll be the last thing I'm taking off today.
I guess I can give the rabble some small consolation...
Pfft...! Well, I am in the lead... So I guess can afford to show off the goods~
Ha! I don't blame you chumps for your persistence. I'd want to see me that bad as well!
Don't think this will become a regular thing!
Do these horns come off...? No...?
COME ON! I'M NOT EXACTLY WORKING WITH MUCH OVER HERE!
Grah...! Don't think for a moment you've won!
Are you that desperate to see my new body naked? Bwahahaha! Keep up the good plays, then, but I won't hold back anymore!
Bwahaha! So you've scored a hit! But don't think your Queen is going down in three stomps!
Gaze upon your Queen, peasants!
Oh no, one measly little loss...? Ha! It's a small price to pay for my eventual victory.
Heh, really bringing your A-game, huh? You're gonna need to if ya plan to dethrone the Queen!
What, ya wanna see more of me? I don't blame ya -- I know my body's perfect.
My body is usually more... thick... but I'm liking this so far. Don't get me wrong, my normal look is PEAK performance, but honestly -- there ain't nothing wrong with a feminine touch.
Hmph. The first few stages are always easy. Just wait until the end.
What's your damage, dealer?! Ya got a death wish or somethin'? Stop making me lose so much!
MAN! I lost again! You're lucky I'm in a good mood right now, or else you'd really regret makin' me do this.
What?! I lost again?!
I'm the only one allowed to rig a card game, dealer!
Steamed as all heck that I'm losing. But hey, it's still early on, right? The tides oughta be changing soon!
Wait, this isn't how this is supposed to go! I'm the final boss -- I can't be the first chump to show my chest!
Darn it, I lost AGAIN?! Cheating's supposed to make you win!
You... you... AAAAAAAAAARGH!
Tch... Getting me this far? Either you're cheating or ya really like this body...
Wait, there must be some mistake! I can't be losing a game about getting naked! I'm not that unlucky!
Bah... All of you are uninvited to my wedding!
Bah... I may be losing, but it’s not game over yet!
GAH! Come on, koopa, get in the game! Ugh, that's it-- winning streak starts now!
You can't be serious...
What!? Me again... What's a Queen gotta do to get some fair friggin' treatment around here?
Stop trying to win, you pinheads!

What? What are you looking at? I ain't taking nothing off until one of these other losers strips...
Bah, fine. But it's the only time I'm stripping. Got it?
What is this load of Delfino dookie? I'm Bowsette, I oughta be winnin' more!
I wish I could take off the crown, but let's just say that wouldn't be allowed for the same reason that purple space dragon took so long to get in smash...
I'll be back from this! You BETTER believe it!
I better get nothing but good cards from now on, or someone is gonna get a Bob-omb on their mail soon...
There's only one blonde princess I'm after and it's not gonna be you, young lady. You can be dang sure of that.
What did I ever do to deserve this butt-whuppin'? Besides the kidnappings, thefts, and general mayhem.
This dress is so hard to move around in! Time to handle this problem the Bowser way.
I might have lost that round, but don't you dare think I'm a loser! Maybe you all need a good distraction...
Oh, I'll give you a show alright! I bet the other princesses wouldn't dare do this!
Where did this dress even come from? I definitely weren't wearing one before I put on this crown... Don't you dare doubt me, ~player~!
You're probably expecting me to remove something boring, right? Well I'm not boring! I'm the friggin' Koopa Queen! Let me show you losers how a queen strips!
Heh. Strength and confidence -- no wonder it's my destiny to rule!
Why must they make these clasps so HARD to undo...!? RRRGH--
These were getting uncomfortable. Peach has terrible taste in shoes.
Bah, I usually go barefoot anyway. I don't need shoes to stomp those pesky Mario Brothers into pancakes -- and I don't need shoes to stomp you chumps into pancakes, either!
Since when did being tall have to hurt in a way that doesn't include bumping your head on high things?!
Well, pain is beauty, isn't it? Never said that pain is worth the beauty, though!
How do princesses even wear these for so long? My ankles were crying after an hour!
You're really enjoying this, aren't you? Go ahead and tell me, ~player~. I don't mind it at all~
Gwahaha... I know a few people who are into feet. You one of 'em?
My stockings it is. Aw, are you disappointed? Sorry for wanting to win this, buddy!
Don't get cocky -- as long as I get some good hands, I can STILL crush you all beneath my heel.
At first, I was against the idea of wearing these stupid things here. Yet they feel so good against my skin that I just had to keep them on!
Y'know what? At least these are satisfying to remove! You can never get that feeling when they don't make socks in your size!
Shut up about why I'm wearing these... It's part of the crown, and Junior thought they looked good on me. You try telling that kid no.
This crown's magic is pretty impressive! Along with the clothes, it gave me these earrings too. I don't like them, but they look expensive, so you better not lose 'em!
What to remove next? I hope you were expecting the earrings, because it's the earrings, alright!
On the bright side, this gives me an excuse to ditch these bulky baubles. With the heft they've got, it gets uncomfortable wearing 'em after a few hours!
... Did I forget I had these..?!
Blast, this is really all I have left...
Yeah, once I get these off it'll be easier to kick your butt!
Maybe I shouldn't have saved my armbands for last... Whuzzat? You'd rather I keep them on?
All this power -- and good looks, too! Yeah, I know you're all thinking it...
Heh, like what you see? Then you're gonna LOVE what comes next~
So much for that "stategic move" I did earlier...
Bah. These things were riding up anyways...
Wait a sec... Did I remember to shave down there?
(Why am I nervous...? I'm literally naked all day. Then again, I guess the usual junk ain't typically on display, either...)
Go ahead, take a good look at what's gonna wear yer tongue out tonight! H-heh heh...
Tough luck, twerp. This crown is fit for a queen only. If anything, I'm passing it down to my son. Or, guh, Daughter, hypothetically.
How's this for a beach body?
The best part of being a firebreather is that I don't have to worry about the cold. I can waltz around in the snow buck naked without a care in the world. You humans and your dumb hypothermia.
Take a look at these honkers! Try not to blow your load too quickly now, will ya? GWAHAHAHA!
Curse this crown! Losing is one thing, but what I really regret is that I can't give you all a showin' of my Koopa Cannon!
SHOWTIME! How d'ya like that?
Be careful! When you pinch Bowser's titties, they pinch back.
Take a look at these Koopa Shells!
Aren't these melons totally fantastic? Certainly way better than any of those dumb princesses' racks.
... Honestly, I thought giant tits would work in my favor more, but by golly if they don't get in the way sometimes. Not to mention the stares I get from Goombas...
What'cha think? These Banzai Bills big enough for you? Don't answer -- I couldn't care one stinkin' bit less.
I don't mind showing off, but I hate to lose! Don't think you'll be getting the rest off this easily!
I'm the big, bad Koopa Queen! Emphasis on big!
If you're wondering... No, they don't sound like note blocks when you bounce them.
You like looking at this body, ~player~? Howsabout, I dunno, throwing the game for it? No? Pah! You have no taste!
Grr... Well, if I'm gonna lose, I might as well make the most of it. Get a load of this, ~player~! C'mon! Let these tits distract you from the game!
I swear these looked much cooler when they had spikes.
Well, enjoy the view, dearies. Nothing else is coming off...
Welp -- there go my awesome spiked bands. Ya better be grateful I'm stoppin' there, ya hear?
It's either the shoes or the crown, and as fun as the latter would be... I would have even less clothes afterwards. So count your blessings this time, worms!
Go ahead and get a good look! It's gonna make crushing you all the better!
I never got used to those heels anyway...
Ankle torture has never been more fashionable...
So long, straight Mario!
Let my guess... my thighs are "super thicc" and you want them to "sandwich" you... I know exactly how you insufferable humans think.
These babies could crush a Koopa Shell! Not that I would crush one, but I'm just sayin'!
Enjoying yourself? Well, SAVOR IT, 'cause you won't be getting any more outta me! That's your QUEEN speaking!
No witty comments or I'll pulverize you! I bet ya I can crack your skull between my thighs! Wanna find out?
Admiring my legs? One of the great things about this form is that I could crack a nut with these thighs. Or maybe even someone's skull!
There. Don't stare at my long, perfect legs too much, ya pervy little pipsqueaks.
Fine, whatever! They were itchy anyway!
Won't be needing this! Fancy dress balls are no match for undressed balls anyway.
That’s better. Never really understood the appeal of dresses or skirts like the princesses do.
I never saw the appeal of these stupid things anyway. Give me a shell instead any day of the week.
Sexy lingerie? This Super Crown really pulled out all the stops -- what, ya think I'd walk around dressed like this as a male Koopa? ...Well, I don't!
BAH! Who needs this thing! Here, let a Koopa Queen show you pathetic rubes how stripping is REALLY DONE!
Ah, much better -- and much easier, too! Who needs to take the whole thing off when you got claws?
You think seeing my tits would be that easy? Think again, bucko!
Huh? I was supposed to take off the entire dress? No thanks! I don't play fair, I play to win!
One man's cheating is another man's way of playing strategically! I like to think of this as the latter! Hah!
Take off the entire dress and reveal most of my body from the getgo? You think I'm the kinda person to play fair, pal?!
Take a picture -- it'll last longer!
Tell me... H-how do you feel about kneeling before your Queen?
If you think I'm embarrassed, then think again! I always walk around naked anyway. S-so there!
What were you expecting, some kind of Koopa cock?
S-so what if I'm basically naked...? Most of the time, these spiky armbands are all I need to wear.
Shavin'? I'm a lizard, what do I have to shave?

Feels weird to have nothing dangling between my legs anymore...
I was referrin' to my tail, not my dick! Since when did I ever romp around with that big thing out?
Whoops! Guess I didn't... Gyeheheh~
Gyeheheh.... A body befitting a Queen, yes?
I still haven't quite gotten used to the whole hairy crotch thing... Koopas might grow hair on their heads, but never between their legs!
W-well, here I am... What do you guys think? Blown away by my queenly appeal, aren't ya...?
